snippet.title: Zero Losses - Future Games teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Zero Losses is a short open-world driving adventure game with horror elements and a hollow atmosphere in the set inspired by the events of the Russo-Ukrainian War.

Survive the modern warfare horror as a soldier of a support battalion, driving your truck through the war-ravaged lands behind the frontline. While others carry the banner of victory forward, your task is not to shoot, but to ensure that this "special operation" has zero losses.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1485920/Zero_Losses/
